name: last
title: .last()
desc: Reduce the set of matched elements to the final one in the set.

examples.desc: Highlight the last span in a paragraph.
examples.html: Look: This is some text in a paragraph. This is a note about it.

entries.longdesc:
Given a jQuery object that represents a set of DOM elements, the .last() method constructs a new jQuery object from the last element in that set.

Consider a page with a simple list on it:


<ul>
  <li>list item 1</li>
  <li>list item 2</li>
  <li>list item 3</li>
  <li>list item 4</li>
  <li>list item 5</li>
</ul>

We can apply this method to the set of list items:

$('li').last().css('background-color', 'red');

The result of this call is a red background for the final item.
